item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:68 Chances: Manhattan Associates and Shopify team up to help retailers deliver better shopping experiences. Monster and Shopify look poised for bull runs in the new year. The deal between Manhattan Associates and Shopify to create exceptional customer experiences at every step of the sales journey.
